page.title: 14Wrafton Village.
page.content: Wrafton is a small village near Braunton.It has a post office and shop all in one.It also has a pub called the{Williams Arms}and one Inn called the{Poyers Hotel.}The Williams Arms is about 50 years old,and Poyers is about 150 years old,as it was a farmhouse before it became the Inn.The bungalows in the village are where the farm orchard used to be.The Barnstaple- Ilfracombe railway ran through Wrafton as well but in the 1970s the railway shut down and nowadays it is a footpath{to Barnstaple from Braunton.
